Title: Relates to establishing the collegiate emergency medical services pilot program
Summary: Establishes a collegiate emergency medical services pilot program to enable college campuses and universities to construct independent emergency services to offset the disproportionate impact that campuses may have on local infrastructure.
LawCode: Add Art 129-C ยง6450, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to creating a collegiate emergency medical services pilot program
